short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Intended to be used on the class search result of the add and drop page of Georgians Banner Page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Banner Add'n Drop Chrome Extension

Functionalities:
1-Display the course time in a calendar
2-Search among all the available schedules
3-Use regular expression to boost your search

Steps:
1-Go to Banner
2-Login
3-Registration
4-Add/Drop/Withdraw From Courses
5-Select Term
6-Class Search
7-Class Search(Leave all filter empty)
8-Now you will see on the upper right corner a new button: ðŸ”ŽCOURSES SEARCH++ðŸš€
